sentences: MAJOR ECONOMIES FORUM ON ENERGY AND CLIMATE (MEF): On 17 April 2010, the MEF Leaders representatives meeting convened in Washington, DC.

Countries participating in the MEF are: Australia, Brazil, Canada, China, the European Union, France, Germany, India, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, the Republic of Korea, Mexico, the Russian Federation, South Africa, the United Kingdom and the US.
The meeting was also attended by the UN, Colombia, Denmark, Grenada and Yemen.
According to the Chair s summary, discussions covered, inter alia , goals for COP 16 and beyond, form of the legal outcome and the Kyoto Protocol s role.
Recognizing the urgency of moving forward, participants felt that in Cancún, countries should, at a minimum, agree on a balanced set of decisions informed by the Copenhagen Accord.
